plot: The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crewmate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

The Enterprise aborts an archaeological mission, responding to an emergency call from the devastated colony on the home planet of deceased crewmate Tasha Yar, Turkana IV. There two Federation officers are held hostage, captured from an escape pod, by the Alliance which has been fighting for decades against a rebel party, the Coalition, which includes Tasha's sister Ishara Yar, who seems prepared to sacrifice anything necessary to help rescue the officers, and wins Data's friendship, but came with a secret agenda.—KGF Vissers

The Enterprise answers a distress call from a Federation freighter in orbit around Turkana IV, home of the late Tasha Yar. The freighter explodes before they can rescue anyone but an escape pod is tracked to the planet's surface. Turkana IV is lawless and quite dangerous but they learn that a group known as the Alliance is holding two survivors from the escape pod. They're surprised when Ishara Yar, Tasha's sister, is assigned by a rival group to act as liaison and to help get the men back. Ishara has little love for her dead sister who she feels abandoned their fight on the planet. She has quite an effect on the crew, particularly Data with whom she becomes fast friends. She is hiding something however.—garykmcd
